testimonials.name: John Doe
testimonials.content: Buddy was amazing and very friendly! Would highly recommend.

testimonials.name: Jane Smith
testimonials.content: Max provided great comfort during my visit. He's such a calm and gentle dog.

testimonials.name: John Williams
testimonials.content: Bella was full of energy and brought a lot of joy. She’s a delightful companion.

testimonials.name: Emily Johnson
testimonials.content: Buddy’s friendly nature made my day. Highly recommended for anyone needing comfort.

testimonials.name: Michael Brown
testimonials.content: Max is incredibly gentle and patient. Perfect for therapeutic sessions.
